channel.title: Alcazar™ RSPS - BETA RELEASE
channel.description:
http://up.ht/hashZB
-Credits- some guy for blank source had it awhile now :/ me for coding
Guys ive released my beta stage to you , as im now out of beta and ive released this for you to work, so a thanks would be nice haha it gives good start for beginners.Hope you enjoy guys thanks for your support through BETA.
[center][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/jheft3.jpg[/img]
[b]The Begining of an Introduction to Alcazar[/b]
Alcazar Development thread started today letting you know theyre is something epic coming your way, giving members of Moparscape an Adventure of a lifetime.With monsters to kill, quests to complete and mythical cities to explore also help Citizens find there deeds by helping them solve a problem such as a quest unlocking new items and making a living off rewards.Take your risk by claiming clue scrolls and gathering pieces of information letting it take place of an adventure to begin and find your treasure! Alcazar has a great system producing a great economy with great foundation procedures, high stability and fragile account safety, talk to your citizen bankers of Alcazar to create your passcode for safety currency of belongings. Gather your items earn your reputation by finding and facing your enemy on a 1v1 combat at edgeville wilderness but think again Alcazar brings you breathless dragons and rattage in varrock city so be sure to take youre risk!
[b]Update 7/04/11 - Tutorial Island Started-[/b] As you begin you face the runescape guide in the tutorial island of Alcazar, which gives you and teaches you the basics all about it.Here you can face artifical skills and make new freinds before you join the ultimate adventure so you learn the knowlege of how to play here.Learn your fishing,mining,smithing and cooking skills here so you cant go wrong! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/243rkfm.jpg[/img]
[b]Survival Expert 7/04/11[/b] Ask your survival expert on her own knowlege on how to survive in the wild by keeping warm by burning your logs, catching your own kill to eat or also makeing your GP raise in value to make a living. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ep0six.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2upv6mp.jpg[/img]
[b]Master chef's basics[/b] Cook your kill or bake your cake learn the basics off the master chef and learn a few tricks indeed with a culture and a passion he sure loves, you can make lots of coins from cooking and fishing as people will allways need food to eat or use for quests and clues. [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/eb5zde.jpg[/img]
[b]Vannaks house Warming[/b] Come face to face with the combat expert of them all and learn from the best on how to fight monsters and be an epic ultimate combat master let him show you the way as he offers you all his knowlege and some of his wears. [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2mhiic7.jpg[/img]
[b]Magic Experts Valocity[/b] As you talk your way through with the magic expert he offers and endulges with specific mystical and magical words very tornting due to the process he gathers and finds you spare runes to guide you magic experience, he vanquishes you into the depths of the main land from here your on your own! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wufc4o.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Alcazar™ RSPS - BETA RELEASE

item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

Nothing special. Nothing cleaned. Just delta with tutorial island.

item.title: Alcazar™ RSPS - BETA RELEASE
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Looks alright. I would add more details, like actually making the bread or getting the nets and fishing for the shrimp. Its just a couple Dialogues and DialogueHandlers.

I would also consider using better grammar for it to be more realistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Alcazar™ RSPS - BETA RELEASE
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

http://up.ht/hashZB

-Credits-
some guy for blank source had it awhile now
me for coding

Guys ive released my beta stage to you , as im now out of beta and ive released this for you to work, so a thanks would be nice haha it gives good start for beginners.Hope you enjoy guys thanks for your support through BETA.

[center]

jheft3.jpg764×122

The Begining of an Introduction to Alcazar

Alcazar Development thread started today letting you know theyre is something epic coming your way, giving members of Moparscape an Adventure of a lifetime.With monsters to kill, quests to complete and mythical cities to explore also help Citizens find there deeds by helping them solve a problem such as a quest unlocking new items and making a living off rewards.Take your risk by claiming clue scrolls and gathering pieces of information letting it take place of an adventure to begin and find your treasure!
Alcazar has a great system producing a great economy with great foundation procedures, high stability and fragile account safety, talk to your citizen bankers of Alcazar to create your passcode for safety currency of belongings.
Gather your items earn your reputation by finding and facing your enemy on a 1v1 combat at edgeville wilderness but think again Alcazar brings you breathless dragons and rattage in varrock city so be sure to take youre risk!

Update 7/04/11 - Tutorial Island Started-
As you begin you face the runescape guide in the tutorial island of Alcazar, which gives you and teaches you the basics all about it.Here you can face artifical skills and make new freinds before you join the ultimate adventure so you learn the knowlege of how to play here.Learn your fishing,mining,smithing and cooking skills here so you cant go wrong!

243rkfm.jpg759×497

Survival Expert 7/04/11
Ask your survival expert on her own knowlege on how to survive in the wild by keeping warm by burning your logs, catching your own kill to eat or also makeing your GP raise in value to make a living.

2ep0six.jpg768×551

2upv6mp.jpg763×500

Master chef’s basics
Cook your kill or bake your cake learn the basics off the master chef and learn a few tricks indeed with a culture and a passion he sure loves, you can make lots of coins from cooking and fishing as people will allways need food to eat or use for quests and clues.

eb5zde.jpg762×501

Vannaks house Warming
Come face to face with the combat expert of them all and learn from the best on how to fight monsters and be an epic ultimate combat master let him show you the way as he offers you all his knowlege and some of his wears.

2mhiic7.jpg761×501

Magic Experts Valocity
As you talk your way through with the magic expert he offers and endulges with specific mystical and magical words very tornting due to the process he gathers and finds you spare runes to guide you magic experience, he vanquishes you into the depths of the main land from here your on your own!

wufc4o.jpg761×495
[/center]

Read full topic
